title: Understanding ADD
text: Attention-Deficit Disorder (ADD) is a condition characterized by certain behavioral symptoms. It is important to identify these symptoms to understand the disorder better.

title: Key Symptoms of ADD
text: ADD primarily involves issues with attention and focus. Consider what difficulties someone with ADD might face in daily activities.

hintAnswer: distractibility and difficulties with mental focus and working memory
title: Identifying the Correct Symptoms
text: Which of the following best describes the symptoms of ADD?
choices: distractibility and difficulties with mental focus and working memory
makes it difficult for the individual to organize or finish a task, to pay attention to details, or to follow instructions or conversations
interrupt others, grab things from other people, or speak at inappropriate times
when children have ongoing pattern of aggression toward others with serious violations of rules and social norms at home, at school, and with peers
